body.section: The IHTSDO Workbench IDE contains a high performance classifier (the SnoRocket Classifier from The Australian E-Health Research Centre. Licensing conditions apply. ( visit http://e-hrc.net for further details.)) for validating the inferred relationships inherent in the terminology, according to the Description Logics upon which SNOMED CT is based. . The SnoRocket Classifier is a highly optimised module for performing complete or incremental classification of SNOMED CT and which can be configured through business process plugins in a number of ways. Additional information on configuration and performance characteristics for developers can be found in Integrating the SnoRocket Classifier.
In most instances, the Workbench IDE is bundled with a Classifier plugin, accessable via the main menu. The following sections illustrate its use.
